channel.title: Foo on APIF Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Foo on APIF Cookbook

item.title: Standing Up New Cxs
item.description: API Development Steps Creating of new CXS 3.5 project Create REST controller class Create Process class and migrate validation logic from 3.0 to 3.5 Process class For each FAST, create a service class (with hystrix setup) and migrate FAST Transaction For each DB call, create a service class (with hystrix setup) and migrate DB native call to JPA call For each CXS REST call, create a service class (with hystrix setup) and migrate to CXS REST call.
